title: Gadget Help
description: We can come to you and help set up printers, phones, smart televisions, tablets and other gadgets

title: Data Recovery
description: Lost you work? Don't fret, The Computer Mechanic is on hand to recover your data.

title: Virus Removal
description: A virus can be unsafe as well as annoying, don't let hackers access your data, let us be the cure

title: PC Upgrade
description: If your PC is aging we can give it a new lease of life by upgrading to newer components like our recommended hard drive or memory

title: Other Services
description: If your problem is not covered above, get in touch using the details at the top of the page.
